thread.section_title: Grange Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, close to Westminster, friendly staff
thread.title_full: Clean, close to Westminster, friendly staff - Review of Grange Wellington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: S8C11
title: Clean, close to Westminster, friendly staff
text: Stayed on business, was originally given a very large disabled friendly room, however the sink was too low and bathroom totaly not right for an able bodied person. The staff moved me with no fuss whilst I was out at a meeting and it was all fine. Rooms clean, shower powerful and bed comfy. The breakfast was normal buffet style and stocked with most things you could need or want!
